data_table.description: The subject consent file includes subject IDs, consent information, subject aliases, and case control status of the subject for Autism.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Disease-Specific (Autism or other Neurodevelopmental Disease, IRB) (DS-AONDD-IRB)

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject for Autism
